title: Photos make a lovely gift for Christmas. But you may need to think about planning them a little earlier...

attachments.displayName:
Photos make a lovely gift for Christmas. But you may need to think about planning them a little earlier. Here I talk about my Christmas Photo Shoot and what ideas I have for what to wear,amongst other ideas.
http://pinkoddy.co.uk/blog/2013/11/05/christmas-photo-shoot/
I need some inspiration on clothes - so if you have any ideas I would really appreciate it. Or any other tips too.

object.content:
Photos make a lovely gift for Christmas. But you may need to think about planning them a little earlier. Here I talk about my Christmas Photo Shoot and what ideas I have for what to wear,amongst other ideas.
http://pinkoddy.co.uk/blog/2013/11/05/christmas-photo-shoot/
I need some inspiration on clothes - so if you have any ideas I would really appreciate it. Or any other tips too.
